channel.title: R on BOBOWU
channel.description: Recent content in R on BOBOWU

item.title: H2O with R Part 1
item.description: Today I have run into H2O again in a blog post. It is well known for its speed in model calculations because the whole H2O machine learning framework is written in Java and all calculations are thus optimized for speedy performance. In case you never deal with Java before, it is a general purpose programming language that could do many things from developing a game to builidng a web scrapping tool.

item.title: How to start business analytics with R
item.description: Extend your data analytics skill from Excel to R to make whatever you do much faster!!

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
